item.title: Ant

item.title: basic stitches
item.description: If this is your first time making amigurumi, you might find it useful to have a tutorial at hand. With the stitches explained. We suggest you practice the basic stitches before you start making one of the designs. This will help you to read the patterns and abbreviations more comfortably. chain (abbreviation: ch) This stitch is the basis for many crochet patterns. If you’re working in rows, your first row will be a series of chain stitches.
